text.autoconfig.taxfreelevels.title: Tax Free Levels
text.autoconfig.taxfreelevels.option.lev:
The player level at which the cost flattening starts.
The lower the base, the higher the tax reduction.

0 removes all tax.
30 is a reasonable base if early game costs shouldn't change.

Note that for the Enchanting Table, the base will
never go below the table's level requirement.
text.autoconfig.taxfreelevels.option.rem:
Removes the Anvil's cost limit of 40 and the
corresponding "Too Expensive!" message.
